main event: A resident reported observing a large, bright red to orange object in the sky at approximately 0515 hours on June 24, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as large and bright,There was no detailed length of observation recorded,The observation was ground-visual and potentially ground-radar,The report is part of the Project Blue Book documentation,The sighting occurred in Vanderhoof, B.C., Canada.
sighted object: large, bright red to orange object
